name: products-api
description: Products API with Lambda and DynamoDB

scripts.setup:local: sleep 5 && aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 dynamodb create-table --table-name products-local --attribute-definitions AttributeName=id,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=id,KeyType=HASH --billing-mode PAY_PER_REQUEST
scripts.local:init: npm run localstack:start && npm run setup:local
scripts.dev: npm run local:init && npm run start
